name: Larry WASLOW, Liquidating Supervisor of the National Organization for Children, Inc. F.D.B.A. T.E.A.C.H., F.D.B.A. the Einstein Academy Charter School, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF EDUCATION, Appellee
name_abbreviation: Waslow v. Pennsylvania Department of Education

parties: Larry WASLOW, Liquidating Supervisor of the National Organization for Children, Inc. F.D.B.A. T.E.A.C.H., F.D.B.A. the Einstein Academy Charter School, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF EDUCATION, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 22nd day of February, 2011, the order of the Commonwealth Court is hereby AFFIRMED.
Jurisdiction relinquished.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
12 A.3d 747
Larry WASLOW, Liquidating Supervisor of the National Organization for Children, Inc. F.D.B.A. T.E.A.C.H., F.D.B.A. the Einstein Academy Charter School, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF EDUCATION, Appellee.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Feb. 22, 2011.
